OrgName.entry: SHARROW COMMUNITY FORUM - VENUES FOR HIRE

AltName.entry: JOHN STREET COMMUNITY HALL/THE OLD JUNIOR SCHOOL

Desc.entry: 2 separate venues managed by Sharrow Community Forum. The Old Junior School has 2 halls (main hall capacity 80, library capacity 40), 3 meeting rooms (capacities 30, 15 and 3), and a training suite with 12 computers and internet access. Tea and coffee making facilities are available and catering can be arranged on request. Projector and laptop also available for hire. The second venue, John Street Community Hall is particularly suited to physical activities such as yoga, tai chi or dance.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm (office hours). Venue available Mon-Fri 9am-10pm, Sat & Sun 10am-8pm
